_description: A couplet in Four lines in Nicholas Bozon’s Contes moralisés incorporating former listing DIMEV 1415 — two couplets, sometimes abbreviated to one

BLAdd46919.Transcription:
Was it nevere my kyndChese in welleȝ grond to fyndeFor was
                    hyt never myn kyndChese in welle to fynd
